name: Tribes of Teldar
description:
THE BATTLE FOR TELDAR BEGINS!

Craft a team of warriors from the fierce tribes inhabiting the land of Teldar! Conquer the battlefield by capturing your opponents warriors and creating devastating chain attacks. Become the most powerful force that Teldar has ever seen!

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER: Test your skills online by challenging opponents across the globe!

3 OFFLINE GAME MODES: Quickplay, Draft and Duel mode each provide a unique gameplay experience.

BITE-SIZED MATCHES: Quick but strategic matches keep you returning to the battlefield for more action.

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER: Battle a friend locally on the same device in any of the three offline game modes.

UPGRADE YOUR DECK: Strengthen your deck after each battle to gather the strongest warriors in all of Teldar!
